mapper.insert: insert into board(bseq, title, content, id) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(bseq), 0) + 1 FROM board a),#{title },#{content },#{id })
insert into board_have_info(bseq,inum) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(bseq), 0) + 0 FROM board a), #{inum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY bseq DESC
